# Predict Stock Return

Let's take DDD as an example. I will set daily average price be approximated by 
$$
P_i = (C_i + H_i + L_i) / 3
$$

```{r cache=TRUE, warning=FALSE}
# let's load quantmod library
library(quantmod)
getSymbols("DDD")
summary(DDD)
```
